about_the_game:
In Stream Defense, up to 72 of your Twitch viewers can join the game by typing commands into chat. Your viewers can finally step out of the chat and into the game itself.

Unlike games with "Twitch integrations", each viewer has full control over their character. Your viewers can even continue playing the game on your stream without you!

This is a class-based tower defense game which challenges you and your viewers to strategize together to defeat waves of enemies and beat high scores.

Gather your viewers, sharpen your swords, and get ready to defend your stream like never before with Stream Defense. See you on the battlefield!

ABOUT THE DEMO


The game is still very much in development. The demo is an early alpha build to gather feedback as I complete the game. I'm currently working on a ginormous update that will simplify some aspects of the game, while introducing more rogue-like elements (think Vampire Survivors)

I've been building this game with the community from the beginning, please join us on discord:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium D 2.8 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 4400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 440 1 GB or AMD Radeon™ HD 5670 1 GB or Intel® HD Graphics 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 4GB or AMD™ Radeon™ R9 280 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: This is a class-based tower defense game which challenges you and your Twitch viewers to work together. In Stream Defense, your viewers can play alongside you by typing commands into chat. Each viewer has full control over their character. Your viewers can even continue playing while you sleep!
